A national dataset describing statistics of soil properties per Local Surface Water

Source: R/bbwp_tables.R
lsw.Rd

This table contains mean and standard deviation of soil properties per Local Surface Water Polygon in the Netherlands

Usage

lsw

Format

A data.table with 546 rows and 32 columns:

oow_id

The unique ID number of the surface water polygon for catchment or polder

oow_name

The name of the surface water polygon for catchment or polder

oow_nitrogen

The nitrogen reduction target within the surface water polygon for catchment or polder (kg/ha)

oow_phosphate

The phosphate reduction target within the surface water polygon for catchment or polder (kg/ha)

oow_source

The type of the surface water polygon for catchment or polder: oow or lsw

oow_mean_n_rt

The mean organic nitrogen content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mg N / kg)

oow_sd_n_rt

The standard deviation of the organic nitrogen content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mg N / kg)

oow_mean_p_cc

The mean plant available P content, measured via 0.01M CaCl2 extraction in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mg / kg)

oow_sd_p_cc

The standard deviation of the plant available P content, measured via 0.01M CaCl2 extraction in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mg / kg)

oow_mean_p_al

The mean plant extractable P content, measured via ammonium lactate extraction in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mg / kg)

oow_sd_p_al

The standard deviation of the plant extractable P content, measured via ammonium lactate extraction in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mg / kg)

oow_mean_p_wa

The mean P-content of the soil extracted with water in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mg P2O5 / L)

oow_sd_p_wa

The standard deviation of the P-content of the soil extracted with water in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mg P2O5 / L)

oow_mean_p_sg

The mean P-saturation index in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (%)

oow_sd_p_sg

The standard deviation of the P-saturation index in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (%)

oow_mean_fe_ox

The mean aluminium content of soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mmol+ / kg)

oow_sd_fe_ox

The standard deviation of the aluminium content of soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mmol+ / kg)

oow_mean_al_ox

The mean iron content of soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mmol+ / kg)

oow_sd_al_ox

The standard deviation of the iron content of soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (mmol+ / kg)

oow_mean_clay_mi

The mean clay content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (%)

oow_sd_clay_mi

The standard deviation of the clay content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder (%)

oow_mean_sand_mi

The mean sand content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder(%)

oow_sd_sand_mi

The standard deviation of the sand content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder(%)

oow_mean_silt_mi

The mean silt content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder(%)

oow_sd_silt_mi

The standard deviation of the silt content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder(%)

oow_mean_som_loi

The mean organic matter content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder(%)

oow_sd_som_loi

The standard deviation of the organic matter content of the soil in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder(%)

oow_mean_ro_r

The mean risk that surface water runs off the parcel in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder

oow_sd_ro_r

The standard deviation of the risk that surface water runs off the parcel in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder

oow_mean_sa_w

The mean wet perimeter index of the field, fraction that field is surrounded by water in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder

oow_sd_sa_w

The standard deviation of the wet perimeter index of the field, fraction that field is surrounded by water in the specific surface water polygon for catchment or polder

geom

The geometry of the surface water polygon for catchment or polder
